summary: This script filters and extracts specific lines from the "POS.log" file based on keywords ("noun", "verb", "word") and saves them to separate files (Kneel0.log, Kneel1.log, Kneel2.log) respectively.

details.comment: This script filters and extracts specific lines from the "POS.log" file based on keywords ("noun", "verb", "word") and saves them to separate files (Kneel0.log, Kneel1.log, Kneel2.log) respectively.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
cat POS.log | grep " noun" | grep -E -o "^[^ ]+" > Kneel0.log
cat POS.log | grep " word" | grep -E -o "^[^ ]+" > Kneel1.log
cat POS.log | grep " verb" | grep -E -o "^[^ ]+" > Kneel2.log
